diluent.name: Diluent
diluent.description: Diluent for Easy Glow inks — use to adjust viscosity and flow for machine or manual painting.

content.technology: Advanced Easy Glow Technology: No Sedimentation, High Resistance to environmental factors, Gamma-sterilized for safety.
content.warning: IMPORTANT: This ink is not approved in Europe and its use is intended for practices on synthetic skin and/or painting only.
content.delivery_notice: Extended Delivery Time: This product is available to order. We currently keep Raven Black and Ghost White in stock. Delivery times may be slightly longer for other colours — message us on WhatsApp for details.

raven-black.name: Raven Black
raven-black.description: Experience Raven Black, meticulously crafted through careful selection of raw materials, precision equipment, and thorough testing. This REACH-compliant ink offers reduced healing time, enhanced fluidity, and exceptional colour fidelity, ensuring your tattoos have superior coverage and strong fixation.

content.technology: Advanced Easy Glow Technology: No Sedimentation, High Resistance to environmental factors, Gamma-sterilized for safety.
content.compliance: Fully compliant with Regulation (EU) 2020/2081 (REACH) for tattoo and permanent makeup inks.

orange.name: Orange
orange.description: Electric Ink introduces the Easy Glow line, a fluid ink with high pigment concentration, perfect for artists who prefer quick application without extensive dilution. Crafted from selected raw materials and backed by Electric Ink's 15+ years of expertise, Easy Glow delivers vibrant colour, easy application, and fast healing on synthetic surfaces.

content.technology: Advanced Easy Glow Technology: No Sedimentation, High Resistance to environmental factors, Gamma-sterilized for safety.
content.warning: IMPORTANT: This ink is not approved in Europe and its use is intended for practices on synthetic skin and/or painting only.
